long_description: Justin's Classic Nut butter packages are the perfect snack for people on the go! Convenient 1.15 oz. squeeze packages are ideal for the backpack, cooler or tackle box. Enjoy on sandwiches, crackers and fruit, or right from the package. Justin's Classic Nut butter is all natural. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Justin's Classic Nut butter packages are the perfect snack for people on the go!
